name: Nightmare SIMULATION.exe
description:
This is a short horror game made by me (Nathan Richardson)

This is one of my first ever games so there are a few bugs and glitches such as the sound and loading times.

I hope you enjoy playing this game if you want to know what games I am currently making then follow me on twitter: @mrmangomonster

You are all free to make YouTube videos on my game but if you do please send me a link over twitter so I can watch it :-)
